name: Anysma
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41.

Anysma is a text-based space shooter.  It's a simple game where your only goal is to survive and make it back to your home planet.

Commands:

  • 'move' or 'm' Moves your ship forward. Usage: move 9
  • 'turn' or 't' Turns your ship. Usage: turn right 3 (You specify what way to turn using 'r', 'l', 'right', or 'left')
  • 'fire' or 'f' Fires your ships weapons.
  • 'stop' or 's' Stops your ship. (Cancels turns and movement)
